metadata.title: CVE-2024-35914 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: nfsd:Fix error cleanup path in nfsd_rename() Commit a8b0026847b8 ("rename():avoid a deadlock in the case of parents having no common ancestor") addedan error bail out path. However this path does not drop the remountprotection that has been acquired. Fix the cleanup path to properly dropthe remount protection.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
